frozen.name: libutempter
frozen.shortDescription: Interface for terminal emulators such as screen and xterm to record user sessions to utmp and wtmp files
frozen.longDescription:
The bundled utempter binary must be able to run as a user belonging to group utmp.
On NixOS systems, this can be achieved by creating a setguid wrapper.
